name: Afraid Of The Dark (Bentot)
description:
NOTE: IF THE GAME SEEMS TO LAG (AUDIO OR VISUAL LAG), I SUGGEST DOWNLOADING THE GAME.  THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE DOWN BELOW

Afraid Of The Dark is a short game I made for the TriJam game jam.   In this game, the light continuously goes dimmer and dimmer, causing you to see less of the level around you, If the lights go out, you're dead.  You must collect coins scattered around the room to replenish those lost lights and keep on living. The problem is, there are ghosts that also want you dead.  Can you last long in the light, or will you crumble in the face of darkness and fear?

A and D to move

Space to jump/double jump

Mouse to aim

Hold Left Click to  shoot

My personal best is 14. See if you can beat it :D 

Credits go to SketchyLogic for some awesome music.
